ygData.subject: BB PowerLevel Loot!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Ive been hunting in BB for since I hit LVL 8. The other day someone shouted: PWRLVLED 3LVLs n 20 minutes! I hailed him & asked him to give up the secret~No
ygData.messageBody:
Ive been hunting in BB for since I hit LVL 8. The
other day someone shouted: PWRLVLED 3LVLs n 20 minutes!
I hailed him & asked him to give up the secret~No
secret, just something Ive never done for XPz<br>
BONECHIPS~I normally sale to NECS for desent PP but, turned
in a stack to Gunlok Jure in the paladin's guild in
Kalidem (4 at a time) & went from 8-9 with a stack! Damn
good xpz! Supposely u can do this all the way up to
60??? If you got the time try it! It is possible that
players with low faction will not get anything by giving
him bone chips.<br> Another really good XP boost is
the Orc Runners BP/Sealed letters-go tto the Pally
guild in Felwithe (downstairs_ generl somebody?)
